articles.description: Google has introduced its inaugural AI-powered search enhancements outside the US in India. The country gets India-specific features of the Search Generative Experience. Next stop is Japan.
articles.content:
In the United States, Google debuted the Search Generative Experience (SGE) earlier this year, incorporating generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) capabilities to enhance the search function.
